attributes.additional_details:
The children of Bournemouth have little say in the decisions made by Bournemouth Council and the Department of Education. Most children uneducated about how to contact their local decision makers and about how politics works on a local and national scale. We, the youth of Bournemouth, would like Bournemouth Council and the DoE to re-introduce the United Kingdom Youth Parliament or a similar scheme to hear and act on the views of the young people of Bournemouth. Furthermore, it is not just Bournemouth, it is the United Kingdom as a whole.

- Michael Bryan
